abstract: In an interview with DealBook, Curtis Jackson, also known as 50 Cent, is bullish on social media and believes Facebook is worth $50 billion, maybe more.
snippet: In an interview with DealBook, Curtis Jackson, also known as 50 Cent, is bullish on social media and believes Facebook is worth $50 billion, maybe more.
lead_paragraph: Curtis Jackson, more commonly known as 50 Cent, has parlayed his career as a hip-hop artist into a multifaceted business and a tidy personal fortune. His minority investment in Glacéau turned into a windfall when Coca-Cola purchased the maker of Vitamin Water for $4.1 billion in 2007.

headline.main: 50 Cent: Facebook Is Worth $50 Billion, Maybe More
